full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation # W8476-236621

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of All Terrain Vehicle (ATV) units. The solicitation references the proposed procurement of quantity 24 ATVs, 4x4, single passenger, 4-stroke engine.

#### Required Delivery Date and Location

The requested delivery date is 120 days from the contract award, with the desired delivery location being found at Base des Forces Armées Canadiennes Valcartier, Québec.

#### Mandatory Requirements and Deliverables

Detailed information about delivery locations, quantities required, mandatory requirements, and deliverables can be found in Annex A entitled "Requirement" and Annex B, entitled "Basis of Payment" of the solicitation package.

#### Documents and Languages

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada, as per Canada's official languages policy.

#### Request for Debriefing

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation, as per the instructions outlined in the solicitation package.

#### Supporting Documents

A complete list of supporting documents, including solicitation records, amendments, and other related attachments are available for download from the Government of Canada Tenders and Procurement website.

### Important Dates

*   Tender Closing Date: December 15, 2022
*   Amendment Date: November 30, 2022
*   Publication Date: November 1, 2022

### Contact Information

For more information or to submit a bid proposal, please contact Antory Laakso at 819-939-6883 or via email at [antony.laakso@forces.gc.ca](mailto:antony.laakso@forces.gc.ca).

### Trade Agreements

The proposed procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including but not limited to:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

- [Notice of Proposed Procurement (pdf)](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/01/c
